discourse_list.title: Mezcal Holiday Season Tasting, Centrifuge & BlackTower Credit, with Asad Khan on Drinks w/MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: Dashing through the snow,    in a one-horse open Spring Cluster sleigh    As we close out 2022 and celebrate the Holidays, we take a moment to sit down with @Khan of Centrifuge and discuss on-chain Real-World Assets, the relationship between Centrifuge, BlackTower Credit, and MakerDAO, and the upcoming proposed Endgame Spring Cluster. We had a joyous conversation along with a special tasting of Zignum Anejo Mezcal, and homemade Kraüteropa Licorice. We really enjoyed discussing and understanding the Centrifuge Protocol, and hope that you do as well. Join @PaperImperium @rspa @Khan and I as we drill down on the future of Real-World Assets. Asad’s Medium Article: BlockTower Credit and MakerDAO to Fund $220 Million of Real-World Assets through Centrifuge  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the Drinks with MakerDAO Delegates YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @Khan a.k.a. Asad Khan, @PaperImperium @ultraschuppi a.k.a. Tim Schuppner @ElProgreso a.k.a. Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a. Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, GFX Labs, BlackTower Credit, Centrifuge, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings Asad: Zignum mezcal, Oaxaca, Mexico   4.3 Stars     Raphael: Kräuteropa Licorice from Germany  4.2 Stars     El Pro: Anchor Christmas Ale 2022, San Francisco, United States   3.5 Stars    PaperImperium: Tap Water from somewhere in the South of the United States   2 Stars

The post also includes a special tasting of Zignum Anejo Mezcal and homemade Kraüteropa Licorice. The content is not financial advice and is for entertainment and informational purposes only.
